DOST anticipating checkpoints even in new normal tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736264 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736264/dost-anticipating-checkpoints-even-in-new-normal/story/ Authorities anticipate that checkpoints set up in connection with quarantine measures brought about by the coronavirus disease (COVID-19) crisis will still be needed even when the country transitions to a "new normal," an official said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 14:40:55 +0800
Less than 1% of over 8,000 COVID-19 cases in PH are foreigners --DOH tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736263 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736263/less-than-1-of-over-8-000-covid-19-cases-in-ph-are-foreigners-doh/story/ "Sa ngayon, batay sa datos namin. Mayroon tayong 70 na foreign nationals na nagkaroon ng sakit, nag-test positive dito sa atin sa Pilipinas," Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said."Out of this 70, 24 sa kanila ay Chinese," she added. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 14:38:25 +0800
Mayor Isko Moreno orders 48-hour 'hard lockdown' of Tondo district 1 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736262 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/metro/736262/mayor-isko-moreno-orders-48-hour-hard-lockdown-of-tondo-district-1/story/ Manila Mayor Isko Moreno on Thursday formally ordered a 48-hour "hard lockdown" of Tondo 1 district starting May 3 until May 5, 2020. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 14:30:38 +0800
PHL, ADB sign $200M loan deal to augment funds for cash assistance to poor households tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736261 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736261/phl-adb-sign-200m-loan-deal-to-augment-funds-for-cash-assistance-to-poor-households/story/ The Philippines and the Asian Development Bank (ADB) have signed an agreement for a $200-million loan for additional funding for the government s emergency cash assistance program to poor and vulnerable households hit by quarantine measures imposed to contain COVID-19 spread. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 14:23:21 +0800
Public transport allowed provided there's one-meter distancing --Año tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736257 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736257/public-transport-allowed-provided-there-s-one-meter-distancing-ano/story/ Some mass transportation will be allowed to operate in areas under general community quarantine (GCQ) provided that one-meter distancing among passengers will be observed, Interior Secretary Eduardo Año said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 14:03:50 +0800
800 DOST scholars volunteer in fight against COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736256 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736256/800-dost-scholars-volunteer-in-fight-against-covid-19/story/ Around 800 scholars of the Department of Science and Technology (DOST) have volunteered for different roles in the department's agencies as the Philippine grapples with COVID-19, Secretary Fortunato dela Peña said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 13:51:15 +0800
DOH exec: Too risky to say COVID-19 already peaked in Philippines tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736255 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736255/doh-exec-too-risky-to-say-covid-19-already-peaked-in-philippines/story/ "When we say it's plateuing, makikita natin doon sa graph na walang masyadong change and parang nagsta-stabilize siya across that numbers," Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said. "It's quite risky for us to declare now that we are plateauing and that we really are reaching that peak. Wala pa ho tayo diyan," she added. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 13:31:11 +0800
Roque insists on One-China policy despite Taiwan's protest tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736254 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736254/roque-insists-on-one-china-policy-despite-taiwan-s-protest/story/ Presidential spokesperson Harry Roque on Thursday stood by his comment that Taiwan is part of China. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 13:23:12 +0800
Lolo, umindak mula sa kanyang wheelchair matapos gumaling sa COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736252 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/ulatfilipino/736252/lolo-umindak-sa-kanyang-wheelchair-sa-tuwa-matapos-gumaling-sa-covid-19/story/ Idinaan ng isang 74-anyos na lolo sa pagsayaw mula sa wheelchair ang kanyang tuwa matapos silang parehong gumaling ng kanyang anak sa COVID-19. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 13:04:15 +0800
Essential work, religious gatherings allowed under GCQ -Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736251 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736251/essential-work-religious-gatherings-allowed-under-gcq-palace/story/ Essential work and religious gatherings will be allowed under general community quarantine (GCQ) provided that social distancing and other safety protocols will be observed, Malacañang said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 13:03:48 +0800
Enrollment ongoing for participants in VCO vs COVID-19 study in Laguna: DOST chief tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736250 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736250/enrollment-ongoing-for-participants-in-vco-vs-covid-19-study-in-laguna-dost-chief/story/ Enrollment is ongoing for patients at a community hospital in Laguna, who are suspected to have COVID-19, for a government study on the benefits of virgin coconut oil in fighting the infectious disease, an official said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 12:56:59 +0800
Specimen collection booths to protect medical staff conducting COVID-19 tests -DOST chief tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736249 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736249/specimen-collection-booths-to-protect-medical-staff-conducting-covid-19-tests-dost-chief/story/ The specimen collection booths the government has started delivering across the country aim to protect medical personnel conducting COVID-19 tests, an official said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 12:50:42 +0800
DOH hires additional lab encoders to address backlogs on release of COVID-19 results tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736247 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736247/doh-hires-additional-lab-encoders-to-address-backlogs-on-release-of-covid-19-results/story/ "Ginawa namin kagabi nakapag-mobilize kami ng maraming mag-eencode para lang mahabol itong encoding," Health Undersecretary Maria Rosario Vergeire said at a virtual conference. "Hopefully, maipasok natin doon sa ating accomplishment itong mga tapos na na test but has not been encoded yet kaya hindi pa nare-release ang resulta," she added. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 12:45:36 +0800
Iloilo, Bacolod cities to remain under ECQ until May 15 -Palace tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736246 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736246/iloilo-bacolod-cities-to-remain-under-ecq-until-may-15-palace/story/ Iloilo and Bacolod cities will remain under enhanced community quarantine until May 15 to curb the spread of the coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19), Malacañang said Thursday. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 12:43:46 +0800
GSIS to release P12.9M for insurance benefits of 8 gov t frontliners succumbed to COVID-19 tag:gmanetwork.com:news_story-736245 https://www.gmanetwork.com/news/news/nation/736245/gsis-to-release-p12-9m-for-insurance-benefits-of-8-gov-t-frontliners-succumbed-to-covid-19/story/ The Government Service Insurance System (GSIS) said Thursday it is set to release a total of P12.9 million in life insurance benefits to the families or beneficiaries of the eight government health workers who succumbed to the COVID-19 virus. Thu, 30 Apr 2020 12:33:19 +0800
